title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Linen tassel, braided and knotted. Double loops attached to short cord which terminates in a pear-shaped tassel, from which hang seven smaller tassels. Center tassel as well as smaller tassels show braiding at top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-36.
